body.name: Car Sun Visor Vanity Mirror, Rechargeable Makeup Mirror with 3 Light Modes & 60 LEDs - Dimmable Clip-on Rear View Sun-Shading Cosmetic Mirror, Universal for Car SUV(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 29 mins
features: DIMMABLE COLOR LED LIGHTS - Your mirror goes in the sun visor, so the light is even on your face. You can doing your makeup with this mirror with flawless results because of the impeccable lighting. Including 3 color lighting modes and stepless dimming function, which can be dimmed or intensified for your needs. Long press for dimming according to what you need.

USB RECHARGEABLE - Built-in 2000 mAh lithium battery, which can be charged by car, socket, computer, mobile power, free to use the vanity mirror at anywhere and anytime. It can last 8 hours if 100% brightness while always On mode.

SMART DOUBLE TOUCH CONTROL DESIGN - There are two touch sensors, simply touch one of touch switches to turn on and off. You can switch the two colors of the lights(cool white, warm yellow). Long press to adjust the brightness of the lights. Memory function makes this mirror with lights return to the same brightness and color when you last using.

UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN - The size of makeup mirror is 8(L)*5(W)*0.35(H) inches, which suits for most of the sun visor of cars. Compact and lightweight design, easy to install and use, does not take up extra space inside the cars.
Customers satisfaction is our top priority! If you are not satisfied with the visor makeup mirror or any issues, please contact us freely, we provide lifetime warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite addition to my car.
reviews.reviewText: Am really enjoying using this car mirror.It’s great to be able to touch up your makeup whole you’re parked, before you go into the office or out to meet friends. It’s a really nice quality, easy to install, charge lasts a long time, and I like the 2 different light options.I thought this would be annoying installed on the driver’s side but it’s given me no problems!

reviews.reviewText: Its great, very good qaulity and the lights are bright id say the only downside is the straps look a little ugly but other thank that its really convenient and looks amazing. plus it was shipped well and kept safe

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I LOVE the mirror it’s great quality and super cute! I also love how bright it is and how it has a warm light feature! And it also has the charging port on both sides so doesn’t matter which side you put it, it’s on both sides. It also has a super long charging cable in case someone in the back seat wants to use it as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These mirror are so great for my car because I didn’t have built in visor mirrors, so I ended up getting two. The mirror is really big which I love, and the lights are adjustable so you can either have a natural or bright white light setting. The velcro makes it very easy and quick to install. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mirror but BEWARE can cause skin damage/sunspots!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mirror. It's perfect for touching up my makeup when I go out. But if you have sensitive skin or care about your skin at all, cover the mirror when your visor is down to block the sun when you're driving during the day.I always keep my visor down when driving during the day, well two months into having this mirror I started noticing a dark spot appear on my forehead between my eyes. I work remotely so I'm not out in the sun very often so I was very concerned about this irregular shaped dark spot on my forehead. I tried covering it with makeup but makeup would not stick to that part of my skin and as time went on that area became really dry and wrinkly looking. I was so confused because I'm in my early 30's and thankfully I don't have any wrinkles and I use a lot of anti-aging products. I went to the dermotogist to make sure it was indeed a sunspot and not something else. I began treating the sunspot with various skin care treatments, I wore 70spf sunscreen and stayed in the house for two wks after a facial peel. The sunspot drastically lightened and became less visible. One day I removed the mirror to charge it and I didn't put in back on my visor because I forgot. I drove around for a month without it and my sunspot did not get bigger and did not darken. Well eventually I put the mirror back on my visor and after a few times driving with it down during the day I noticed the sunspot was darkening again. Then it hit me the mirror was reflecting the sun onto my forehead causing skin damage. The sunspot appeared around the time I got the mirror. So I began treating the sunspot all over again and now I remove it when I'm driving during the day and the sun spot on my forehead has not darkened.Please beware....When UV rays hit a mirror, the mirror reflects most of the UVA light. This light then hits your skin, generating a cascade of free radicals that leads to wrinkles and dark spots. Remove the mirror to put a piece of cloth over it when driving with your visor down!!!!
Unbelievable mirror. The lighting feature is amazing!!

TLDR; Great Mirror. Large size. Lights work and are very bright!This is such a great mirror! I've had it for a few months now. I purchased it because I was going to school and would arrive before sunrise. I used the lights to study for quizzes and tests. It was perfect to do my hair and makeup when I was running late. The mirror it huge. The lights are bright and the settings are awesome. I still haven't had to charge it! It will be great for road trips!Thank you! I love it!
Es un espejo muy práctico con iluminación perfecta para el auto, es adaptable y compacto, gran experiencia de uso y de fácil portabilidad

Excelente tiene un gran tamaño justo le queda a la visera de un Mirage y sus luces tienen una gran iluminaciónPero a la vez es la luz es su único problema, es mucha y no tiene forma de bajar la intensidad ya que de noche si llega a incomodar
